DOC.brief_summary: People live Northern latitude risk suffer vitamin D insufficiency due low sun exposure risk may even pronounce among elite swimmer since indoor training reduces sun exposure . In light , investigator want examine vitamin D status young elite swimmer association vitamin D status muscle strength .
DOC.detailed_description: To examine vitamin D status young elite swimmer association vitamin D status muscle strength , twenty-nine swimmer , 12 female 17 male ( 16-24 year ) reside latitude 55-56°N include trial conduct March-April . Blood sample analyse serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( s-25 ( OH ) D ) hand-grip strength measure marker muscle strength . Subjects´ vitamin D calcium intake assess food frequency questionnaire sun exposure training status questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Age : 1635 year Top atlets , conduct : Hard physical activity Indoor elitesport min . 10 hour week Healthy , without use medication Eat fish max 2 time per week Use corticosteroid Illness Use supplement Use solarium Donation blood within last 3 month Having spent time latitude 42° north September April
